unit.utterance: Ebtedā ke avalaš yek bāqbān bud bālāye deraxt dāšt mivehāyaš rā mičid
unit.utterance_translation: At the beginning, there was a gardner, who was picking fruits on top of a tree

unit.utterance: bad=aš yek dāne, az samte digar mardi bā yek bozqāle rā didam
unit.utterance_translation: then from the other side, I saw a man with a goat

unit.utterance: az kenāre mivehā=yešān be zur rad šod čon bozqāle mixāst mivehāyešān rā boxorad
unit.utterance_translation: it was difficult for him to cross, because the goat wanted to eat the fruits
then a boy came on a bike

unit.utterance: pesare dočarxesavār ke āmad in mard se tā sabad mive gozāšte bud pāyine deraxt xodaš bālāye deraxt dāšt mive mičid
unit.utterance_translation: when the boy came, there were three baskets of fruits down the tree while the man himself was on the tree

unit.utterance: bad yeki az sabadhā rā be surate qāyemaki bardāšt bā dočarxeaš bord vasate rāh ke miraft
unit.utterance_translation: then he took one of the baskets secretly, and carried away with his bike, on his way

unit.utterance: yek doxtarxānumi dāšt bā dočarxe miyāmad
unit.utterance_translation: a girl was coming with her bike

unit.utterance: ke havāsaš be u part šod dočarxeaš xord be yek sang xord zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he got distracted by the girl, his bike collided with a stone, he fell down

unit.utterance: xord zamin va in mivehā az tuye sabad rixt
unit.utterance_translation: he fell down and the fruits spilled out of the basket

unit.utterance: az sabad rixt va bad ke pā šod se tā pesar ān samt bālāye saraš budand
unit.utterance_translation: they were out of the basket and after he got up, three boys were standing right there

unit.utterance: āmadand beheš komak kardand mivehāyaš rā jam kardand gozaštand ruye dočarxe raft
unit.utterance_translation: they came to help him, gathered up all the fruits, put them all in the basket and he left

unit.utterance: ān pesarhā ham ke harkat kardand jolotar didand ke yek kolāh oftāde ruye zamin kolāhe in pesare
unit.utterance_translation: the boys left too, a bit farther, they noticed a hat on the ground, the boy's hat

unit.utterance: Sedāyaš kardand dobāre pesar bargašt va u kolāh rā beheš dād pesari ham ke mivehā rā bardāšte bud
unit.utterance_translation: they called him, the boy turned back, they gave him the hat, and the boy who took the fruits

unit.utterance: yek čandtāyi sib be inhā besurate hediye dād
unit.utterance_translation: gave them a few apples as present

unit.utterance: bad ān pesarak raft va inhā ham ke bargaštand az hamān jāyi ke ān bāqbān dāšt mivehāyaš rā mičid rad šodand
unit.utterance_translation: then the boy went away, they returned too, and they pass the man who was picking the fruits

unit.utterance: bad bāqbān ke āmade bud pāyin did ke yeki az sabadhāye miveaš nist taajob kard bad ān čandtā bače ke dāštand rad mišodand did nafari yeki az ān mivehā dastešān ast taajob kard
unit.utterance_translation: then the gardner who had climbed down, notice that one of the baskets was not there, he got surprised, and then he saw the kids, who had the fruits in their hands, he got surprised.
